name: Zombies vs. Steamroller + Bulldozer: Puppy Rescue 3D Racing Simulator
name_original: Zombies vs. Steamroller + Bulldozer: Puppy Rescue 3D Racing Simulator
description:
Ever wanted to know what is felt like to run over a Zombie with a Steamroller or Bulldozer? Then this game is for you. There are 5 challenging levels where the object is to run over zombies and rescue a cute puppy. Why a cute puppy? Because, for your information, Zombies absolutely love puppies.

The game puts you behind the wheel of 2 of the most popular construction vehicles : The Bulldozer and the Steamroller. We tried to create an ideal combination of simulation and fun. The driving simulation is in 3D and gives you the feeling like you are actually driving in the graveyard at night, hunting zombies.

Level 1: Puppy Rescue

Hunt down 10 Zombies and run them over with your vehicle.
Find the puppy
Bring the puppy back to the safe zone


Level 2: Double Puppy Rescue

Hunt down 20 Zombies and run them over with you Truck
Find the 2 puppies
Bring the puppies back to the safe zone

Level 3: Triple Puppy Rescue

Hunt down 20 Zombies and run them over with your Bulldozer or Steamroller
Find 3 Puppies
Bring the puppies back to the safe zone

Level 4: Quad Puppy Rescue

Hunt down 30 Zombies and run them over with your Bulldozer or Steamroller

Level 5 : Bonus Level

Zombie Free for All !!
Run over 100 Zombies
Thats all! Have fun smashing and crashing
